name: A Druid's Day
description:
Play as a druid trying to restore the land as it constantly tries to turn barren. Turn 50% of the land green to win the game. Land near trees can't turn barren and flowers attract bees that can make honey(mana). Use stones to remove locusts before they turn the land back to dirt.

Any feedback is appreciated. Thank you for playing!

Controls:

Arrow keys for movement

1-4 for spells
